The Called
Rachel Keller (Naomi Watts) is a journalist who decides to investigate the mysterious death of her niece. She perceives the relationship of her death and several other deaths with a strange video, which makes all the people who watch die exactly seven days later. Intrigued by the story, she now needs to find a way to prevent that prophecy is realized, as she and her son watched the video.

The Ring 2
Six months after the events that terrorized Rachel Keller (Naomi Watts) and her son Aidan (David Dorfman), the two attempt to leave behind the memories of Samara (Daveigh Chase) and her cursed videotape. Rachel and Aidan move from Seattle to the small coastal community of Astoria, in Oregon, where they intend to start a new life. However, after the occurrence of a local crime that has a video tape involved, Samara returns to restart its cycle of deaths.
